scripts.#1: Create a new file under './sounds' for your version. Edit Config to include current version info.
scripts.#2: Add icons to sounds. If a previous config exists, edit the config to include previous config version info,
scripts./: then run these for easier editing until #3, otherwise, skip to #3.
scripts.#4: Run this if a previous version of the soundboard exists and you wish to compare them.
scripts.#6: Run this to clear all files. The finalised Soundboard should be published.
